markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Hillcross](/Articles.aspx?ID=59)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 64</row>

Mammoth Lords convene at the only major settlement in their realm to trade, gather news, and negotiate peace. Explore the Oasis of the North, Hillcross!
name: Hillcross
